column2: Your efforts to end [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] have borne fruit.  Agents are now in place to facilitate the next step of your plan.  What will it be?
Attack them.  (This will place you at risk)
Send someone to lead an attack.
A plan is in place to exploit a moment of weakness in [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s defensive precautions.  Go through with the plan to personally lead the attack on them?
You have become comfortable in your daily routine.  Unfortunately this complacency made your guard slip and an enemy has used the occasion to attack you.  You...
... stave off the attack but are forced into torpor!
... foil the attack, leaving both you and the attacker injured.
... foil the attack, leaving both you and the attacker maimed.
... foil the attack, slaying the person leading the attack!
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape your vicious attack.  However, they succumbed to torpor shortly after escaping.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape your vicious attack.  However, they succumbed to torpor shortly after escaping.  Your involvement is known.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape your vicious attack.  You have both suffered injuries.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape your vicious attack.  You have both suffered grievous injuries.!
You have died during your attack on [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]!
Who will you send to organize and lead the attack on [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s haven?
Which ghoul will lead the attack on [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s haven?
You have become comfortable in your daily routine. Unfortunately this complacency made your guard slip and an enemy force has attacked your haven during the day!  Your forces...
... stave off the attack but you are forced into torpor!
... foil the attack, leaving one of your courtiers dead.
... foil the attack, leaving both a courtier and the attacker dead.
... foil the attack, slaying the person leading the attack!
Your haven attack against [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has succeeded.
Your haven attack against [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has succeeded.  It is known they died by your orders.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to spirit away their master during the attack on their haven.  However, [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] succumbed to torpor shortly afterwards.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  However, [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] succumbed to torpor shortly afterwards.  Your involvement is known.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  One of their servants died and [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] lived.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  One of their servants died and [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] lived.  Your involvement is known.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  Both a servant and [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] died.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  Both a servant and [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] died.  Your involvement is known.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] died leading the attack.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] died leading the attack.
A plan is in place to exploit a moment of weakness in [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s defensive precautions.  Who will you send to lead the attack?
An enemy of [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] in their realm.
Who will lead the prepared attack on [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]?
You have become comfortable in your daily routine. Unfortunately this complacency made your guard slip and an enemy has used the occasion to attack you.  You...
... stave off the attack but are forced into torpor!
... foil the attack, leaving both you and the attacker injured.
... foil the attack, leaving both you and the attacker maimed.
... foil the attack, slaying the person leading the attack!
Your delegated attack by [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] on [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has succeeded.
Your delegated attack by [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] on [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has succeeded.  Your involvement is known.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName]'s vicious attack.  However, they succumbed to torpor shortly after escaping.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName]'s vicious attack.  However, they succumbed to torpor shortly after escaping.  Your involvement is known.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName]'s vicious attack.  They have both suffered injuries.
[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName]'s vicious attack.  They have both suffered injuries.  Your involvement is known.

[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape [plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName]'s vicious attack.  They have both suffered grievous injuries! Your involvement is known.
[plot_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] has died leading the attack on [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]!
